com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.formatters.duration.DurationType

Packages that use DurationType
Package
Description
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.formatters.duration
Provides formatting for Duration values into localized, natural language strings.

  • Uses of DurationType in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.formatters.duration

    Methods in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.formatters.duration that return DurationType
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static DurationType
    DurationType.classify(Duration duration, ChronoUnit precision)
    Classifies a Duration into one of three DurationType categories used for formatting: UNLIMITED – if the duration is negative, it represents an unlimited time LESS_THAN – if the duration is non-negative and less than one unit of the specified precision NORMAL – if the duration is equal to or greater than one unit of the specified precision
    static DurationType
    DurationType.valueOf(String name)
    Returns the enum constant of this class with the specified name.
    static DurationType[]
    DurationType.values()
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum class, in the order they are declared.
